 Region 1, 2, 3, trigger scint., or cerenkov.

 Which arm of the rotator, or octant number.

 Direction of the plane: X, Y, U, V; R, theta; etc.

 R or theta index for R1; plane index for R2 & R3.
Bool_t fAmbiguousElement
 Trace # for R1; wire # for R2 & R3; PMT # for others.
Bool_t fLRAmbiguity
 TRUE if this hit could come from two different elements (used by Region 3 tracking only).
Double_t fRawTime
 TRUE if the other element is 8 wires "right"; FALSE if the other element is 8 wires "left" (used by Region 3 tracking only).
Double_t fTime
 Time as reported by TDC; it is UNSUBTRACTED.

 Start corrected time, may also be further modified.
